The committee was set up last fall, after the Pharmacare Act became law, and was given a year to report back to the health minister. The pha

articles.title: Canada is an agriculture and food superpower. We must start acting like it
articles.description: Investing in agriculture could help Canada reach goal of doubling non-U.S. exports

articles.title: This SEC decision will have huge consequences for Canada’s capital markets
articles.description: Opening the Canadian market to hundreds of new U.S. ETFs could threaten our economic sovereignty

articles.title: Mexico has jumped past Canada to become the U.S.’s top customer
articles.description: Mexico’s imports of U.S. goods soared in July and August, topping Canada’s purchases by a combined US$4.9-billion

articles.title: Armed men abduct children and staff at a Catholic school in Nigeria, days after latest abduction
articles.description: ABUJA, Nigeria (AP) — Armed men attacked a Catholic boarding school in a western region of Nigeria and abducted several schoolchildren and staff early Friday, the latest in a spate of abductions in Africa’s most populous country that came just days after 25 schoolgirls were abducted in a neigh

articles.title: Armed men abduct children and staff at a Catholic school in Nigeria, days after latest abduction
articles.description: ABUJA, Nigeria (AP) — Armed men attacked a Catholic school in a western region of Nigeria and abducted several schoolchildren and staff early Friday, days after 25 schoolgirls were abducted in a neighboring state, officials said. The attack and abductions took place at St. Mary’s School, a Catholic

articles.title: At least five killed as magnitude 5.5 earthquake hits Bangladesh
articles.description: Dozens more injured as buildings in the capital swayed in the earthquake, sending panicked residents into streets.

articles.title: At least 41 dead as relentless rains flood Vietnam
articles.description: The coastal cities of Hoi An and Nha Trang, and a key coffee-producing belt, are among the worst-hit.

articles.title: Archaeologists lift the lid on a 1,700-year-old Roman sarcophagus hidden beneath Budapest
articles.description: BUDAPEST, Hungary (AP) — A remarkably well-preserved Roman sarcophagus has been unearthed in Hungary’s capital, offering a rare window into the life of the young woman inside and the world she inhabited around 1,700 years ago. articles.title: Countries sharply split on fossil fuels on COP30 climate summit final day

articles.title: Zelensky ready to work with US on 'their vision' for ending Ukraine war
articles.description: Kyiv says it is willing to engage with a US-backed draft peace plan aimed at ending the war with Russia.

articles.title: A boiler explosion at a glue-making factory in eastern Pakistan kills 18 people
articles.description: LAHORE, Pakistan (AP) — A boiler at a glue-making factory in eastern Pakistan exploded on Friday, killing at least 18 people and injuring 21 others. The force of the blast destroyed the factory building and damaged several nearby homes, igniting a huge fire and spreading panic through the area, offi

articles.title: A boiler explosion at a glue-making factory in eastern Pakistan kills 15 workers
articles.description: LAHORE, Pakistan (AP) — A boiler at a glue-making factory in eastern Pakistan exploded on Friday, killing at least 15 workers and injuring seven others. Police said they arrested the factory manager and were looking for the factory owner who fled shortly after the blast. The cause of the explosion a

articles.title: A 5.5 magnitude earthquake in central Bangladesh kills at least 6 people
articles.description: DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) — A 5.5-magnitude earthquake shook central Bangladesh on Friday, killing at least six people and leaving dozens injured, authorities said. Buildings in the country’s capital, Dhaka, swayed in the temblor, sending panicked residents into the streets. The quake hit at 10:3
